trans-unit.source: Defines routed commands that are common to window management.
trans-unit.target: 창 관리에 공통 된 라우트된 명령을 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The commands in the SystemCommands class represent a set of common commands that manage a <xref:System.Windows.Window>.
trans-unit.target: SystemCommands 클래스의 명령에 <xref:System.Windows.Window>.</xref:System.Windows.Window> 를 관리 하는 일반적인 명령 집합을 나타내는

trans-unit.source: The properties in this class represent <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> objects and do not provide the implementation logic for the command.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 속성을 나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>개체 명령에 대 한 구현 논리를 제공 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can provide the logic for a command by binding the command with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 명령에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> 바인딩하여 명령에 대 한 논리를 제공할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Hook Up a Command to a Control with No Command Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: 후크를 정도 컨트롤에 명령 아니요 명령을 지원](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, the SystemCommands class provides static methods that implement the logic for the specified <xref:System.Windows.Window>.
trans-unit.target: SystemCommands 클래스 <xref:System.Windows.Window>.</xref:System.Windows.Window> 지정된에 대 한 논리를 구현 하는 정적 메서드를 제공 하는 또는

trans-unit.source: You can pass a static method to a type that implements <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and that accepts a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 형식에 정적 메서드를 전달할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>대리자를 수락 하 고.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the example in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> class.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> 의 예제를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Closes the specified window.
The window to close.
Gets a command that closes a window.
A command that closes a window.
Maximizes the specified window.
The window to maximize.
Gets a command that maximizes a window.
A command that maximizes a window.
Minimizes the specified window.
The window to minimize.
Gets a command that maximizes a window.
A command that maximizes a window.
Restores the specified widow.
The window to restore.
Gets a command that restores a window.
A command that restores a window.
Displays the system menu for the specified window.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 창에 대 한 시스템 메뉴를 표시합니다.

trans-unit.source: The window to have its system menu displayed.
trans-unit.target: 해당 시스템 메뉴를 표시 하는 창입니다.

trans-unit.source: The location of the system menu.
Gets a command that displays the system menu.
trans-unit.target: 시스템 메뉴를 표시 하는 명령을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A command that displays the system menu.
